summary: REQ-2 (Google Drive label) and REQ-3 (footer closing message with line break) appear implemented. REQ-1 (static profile photo asset at the specified public path, with Hero img continuing to reference it) is not evidenced in the diff summary (no asset added, HeroSection change not shown). There is also an apparent addition of a Twitter contact method that was not requested and conflicts with the stated non-goal of not adding new contact methods.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate/place the static profile photo at `frontend/public/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg` (from `cropped_circle_image.png`) and keep the Hero avatar img src pointing to `/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg` with no backend fetch.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files (so the required JPG asset is not present), and no `HeroSection` diff is provided to verify the `img` src still points to the required static path.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions HeroSection uses uploaded photo, but no actual code diff or asset file shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/introduced a Twitter contact card/link in the Contact section.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly prohibit adding new contact methods; Twitter is not mentioned as a requested change.
evidence: frontend/src/components/cv/ContactSection.tsx (imports `SiX` and includes `{ icon: SiX, label: 'Twitter', value: 'Twitter Profile', href: data.twitter }`)
